statements: SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, mortgage_type FROM loan_applications ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_name, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT application_id, customer_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE mortgage_type = 'Fixed';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE mortgage_type = 'Fixed Rate' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, customer_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000;
SELECT customer_name, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01' AND application_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT application_id, customer_id FROM mortgage_applications WHERE mortgage_amount < 100000 ORDER BY property_address ASC
SELECT customer_id, application_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications JOIN mortgage_applications ON loan_applications.customer_id = mortgage_applications.customer_id ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount FROM loan_applications
SELECT application_date, property_address, mortgage_amount FROM mortgage_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY mortgage_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, status FROM loan_applications WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM loan_applications GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, status FROM loan_applications WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, amount, status FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT id, customer_id, property_address, loan_amount FROM mortgage_applications WHERE loan_amount < 200000 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customer_details WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT CustomerID, LoanAmount, Status FROM LoanApplications WHERE LoanAmount > 50000;
SELECT CustomerID, ApplicationDate, LoanAmount FROM MortgageApplications ORDER BY ApplicationDate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE Country = 'USA';
SELECT ApplicationID, CustomerID, Status FROM ApplicationsStatus WHERE Status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT Customer_Name, Loan_Amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE Loan_Status ='Approved' AND Loan_Amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM MortgageApplications WHERE Property_Value > 200000 AND Mortgage_Type ='Fixed' ORDER BY Application_Date DESC;
SELECT Customer_Name, Application_Status FROM LoanApplications INNER JOIN ApplicationsStatus ON LoanApplications.Application_ID = ApplicationsStatus.Application_ID;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, role FROM BankEmployees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT application_id, customer_id, property_address, application_date FROM MortgageApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM MortgageApplications WHERE down_payment > 50000
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM BankEmployees WHERE role = 'loan officer' ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM Accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_balance > 10000
